subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Despite blowing a 23-point lead, the Cavaliers battled back to beat the Miami Heat, 102-90, on Tuesday night, getting a small dose of satisfaction against LeBron James.
snippet: Despite blowing a 23-point lead, the Cavaliers battled back to beat the Miami Heat, 102-90, on Tuesday night, getting a small dose of satisfaction against LeBron James.
